title: The Eternity Stone
description: From the dawn of time to the future light years awayThe warrior - Tal Mikar, an Outcast from his tribe on the planet Aryar and custodian of the Chalice of Time, embarks on a dual quest - to find the infinitely powerful Eternity Stone, and to rescue the woman he loves.The woman - Alytha, torn from Tal's side, endures slavery and degradation in her struggle to be reunited with her lover. The wizard - Anda, his immortal, infernal powers released at last from the Eternity Stone which has imprisoned him for millennia, marshals his evil forces against Tal and his cohorts in a battle to end all battles - the Third Infrastatic War! The power of the Eternity Stone lives on!
author: Aden F. Romine
